description: A treacherous area of the sea filled with massive icebergs that move independently under the control of the Accino Family. The icebergs can trap ships and create whirlpools, serving as a deadly defense system for Lovely Land.
keyFeatures: Moving icebergs controlled by unknown means
Serves as a trap for approaching ships
Located in or near the Florian Triangle

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Encounter Moving Icebergs
keyEvents.description: The Thousand Sunny and Phoenix Pirates' ship become surrounded by icebergs that move on their own.
keyEvents.significance: First major obstacle created by the Accino Family's territory defenses.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Cuts Iceberg in Half
keyEvents.description: Zoro demonstrates the danger by slicing through a massive iceberg.
keyEvents.significance: Proves the icebergs are real threats that need to be dealt with.

keyEvents.title: Icebergs Attack the Ships
keyEvents.description: The controlled icebergs begin actively attacking and attempting to trap both ships.
keyEvents.significance: Escalates the danger and forces the crews to take action.

historicalSignificance: Part of the Accino Family's territory and defensive system

reveals.information: Icebergs in this area can be controlled to move and attack ships
Serves as a trap and defense system for the Accino Family

description: The second ship of the Straw Hat Pirates, built by Franky and the Galley-La Company. A brigantine-rigged sloop with advanced features including the Coup de Burst escape system.

keyEvents.title: Uses Coup de Burst to Escape
keyEvents.description: Franky activates the Coup de Burst to blast the ship free from the ice trap.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the ship's special escape capabilities.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hat Flag Stolen
keyEvents.description: The Accino Family steals the Jolly Roger flag from the Thousand Sunny.
keyEvents.significance: Major loss that drives the arc's conflict.

historicalSignificance: Second ship of the future Pirate King's crew

name.japanese: フェニックス海賊団の船

description: The ship of the Phoenix Pirates, heavily damaged from their defeat in the New World. Currently being used while the crew works under the Accino Family.
keyFeatures: Damaged from battles in the New World
Has a medical area where Puzzle recovered

keyEvents.title: Puzzle Awakens
keyEvents.description: Puzzle regains consciousness aboard his ship after being treated by Chopper.
keyEvents.significance: Location of Puzzle's character-defining moment of despair.

keyEvents.title: Separated from Thousand Sunny
keyEvents.description: The rope connecting the ship to the Thousand Sunny is severed, separating Luffy and Chopper from their crew.
keyEvents.significance: Creates the split storylines for the arc.

historicalSignificance: Survived the devastating attack in the New World

reveals.information: Ship is damaged from the crew's defeat in the New World

description: The second half of the Grand Line, known for its extreme danger and powerful pirates. Only the strongest crews can survive here.
keyFeatures: Second half of the Grand Line

keyEvents.title: Phoenix Pirates' Defeat
keyEvents.description: Through flashback, the Phoenix Pirates' devastating defeat in the New World is shown.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the extreme danger of the New World even for crews with 100 million bounty captains.

keyEvents.title: Vigaro's Death
keyEvents.description: Vigaro dies in the New World while helping his crew escape from powerful enemies.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the lethal consequences of entering the New World unprepared.

historicalSignificance: The ultimate proving ground for pirates seeking the One Piece

reveals.information: Powerful enough to completely defeat a pirate crew with a 100 million bounty captain
